snippet: The New York Times has protested an election-eve expulsion order for Declan Walsh, a veteran correspondent.
abstract: Pakistan's Interior Ministry orders expulsion of Islamabad bureau chief for The New York Times, Declan Walsh, on the eve of national elections; Times strongly protests the move and seeks his reinstatement.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times has protested an election-eve expulsion order for Declan Walsh, a veteran correspondent.

headline.seo: Pakistan Orders New York Times Reporter Declan Walsh to Leave
headline.main: On Eve of Pivotal Election, Pakistan Orders Times Reporter to Leave
headline.print_headline: On Eve of Pivotal Election, Pakistan Orders Times Reporter to Leave
